entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Avoiding Duplication for Random.GetItems #102229
  • Crash on Rosetta for double mapping jitted code #102226
  • [API Proposal]: Regex Streaming Mode #102221
  • net7.0-ios16.1 depends on non-existent Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Ref 7.0.20 #102214
  • "Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces, Version=1.0.0.0" in tests on Debian #102213
  • [Console]::Beep() does not activate "Bell Notifications" #102211
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-30045 | .NET Remote code Execution Vulnerability #102206
  • Error MSB6006: "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797. #102205
  • [HttpStress] `HttpIOException` with `HttpRequestError=Unknown` and `QuicError=OperationAborted` on Windows #102202
    9.0.0
  • SubjectAlternativeNameBuilder.AddDnsName throws ArgumentException #102201
  • [wasm] we should use instantiateStreaming #102200
  • ilasm produces wrong SequencePoints when a method references several Documents #102198
  • EventSource event with 4 string parameters with null values behaves inconsistent in .NET 8 #102197
  • [browser][MT] mono_download_assets - RangeError: Start offset -1 is outside the bounds of the buffer #102196
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] System.Buffers.ArrayPool.Tests - Could not allocate #102195
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add MediaTypeNames.Text.EventStream for server-sent events #102194
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonPropertyFlag to System.Text.Json.Serialization to signal Property existence in Deserialize objects. #102186
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 6 System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests Regressions #102203

Closed

  • Use another Core Assembly with `PersistedAssemblyBuilder` #101018
    9.0.0
  • Space before AM/PM in the en-US locale changed from regular (0x0020) to non-breaking (0x202f) #102220
  • Generate asmparse.c using a standard bison/yacc #4776
    Future
  • App using Powershell.SDK fails to run, when building as SingleFile #102193
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(genRegMask(initReg) & intRegState.rsCalleeRegArgMaskLiveIn) == 0' in win-x86 #102161
    9.0.0
  • MONO interpreter: NIY encountered in method #98730
    9.0.0
  • LibraryImportGenerator, .NET 7: possible error in the 'Equals' method implementation #78145
    7.0.x
  • [browser][MT] Multithreading and JavaScript async interop in .NET 9 #85592
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] System.Reflection.Tests - Assertion: sgen-scan-object.h:93 #100932
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] GC deadlock #96190
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] TIMED_OUT but 0 was expected #99888
    9.0.0
  • `NullReferenceException` with bulk memory copy helper on win-x86 #102138
    9.0.0
  • dotnet 7.0.4 (iOS): NullReferenceException in Socket-related code (originating from Http2Connection disposal) #87031
  • [7.0] tvos arm64 mono: Failed to list devices #84394
    7.0.x
  • [7.0] Linux_bionic arm64 failure in Convert.cs causing FormatException in System.Diagnostics.Process tests #88756
    7.0.x
  • [OCSP Stapling] Cached bad response of Server-Side OCSP stabling in .NET7 Linux #89907
    8.0.0
  • Internal CLR error on 7.0.307 and 7.0.400 SDK #91695
    7.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Update llvm-libunwind to v18 #102231
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [cdac] Remove Try versions of ReadGlobal* on target #102230
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Refactor IV opts a bit #102228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Propagate VNF_PtrToLoc(lcl, offset) as GT_LCL_ADDR node #102227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify convertDoubleToUInt64 #102225
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix some issues around accessing invalid blocks for Number.BigInteger #102224
    area-System.Numerics
  • Add FrozenSet.Create collection builder #102223
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Remove `RequiresPreviewFeatures` attribute on `Lock`, add test using the `lock` keyword #102222
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [browser] make MarshalerType enum const #102219
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement Math's DotProduct* APIs #102218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [release/8.0] Fix NegotiateStream connections between Linux clients and Windows servers #102216
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [browser][MT] tests #102212
    arch-wasm, needs-area-label, 9.0.0
  • Move CORINFO_HELP_BULK_WRITEBARRIER to a pre-Lower phase #102209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #102208
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #102207
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security
  • ilasm support for methods with multiple documents #102199
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the register conflict of the `REG_GSCOOKIE_TMP` and the `FastTailCall target register`. #102192
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disable APC by default #102191
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm][workloads] Check downlevel runtime versions #102190
    arch-wasm, area-Workloads, 9.0.0
  • [Mono] added simple reverse pinvoke support to interpreter #102185
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [browser] optimize condition on mono_log_debug #102184
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Added cases to reuse the set if comparer matches #102182
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Expose the FusedMultiplyAdd and MultiplyAddEstimate APIs on relevant vector and scalar types #102181
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • ILASM: Add simple `README.md`describing how to use Bison to generate the ILASM parser. #102217
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [WinHttpHandler] Move `_cachedSendPinnedBuffer` ownership to `WinHttpRequestState` #102083
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Backport "Merge CoreCLR-based official builds legs into one leg per platform" #102097
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Use bison for ilasm parser generator #101415
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Spanify some ``Utf8String`` and ``Utf8StringBuilder`` use #102101
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Allow using pinvoke registers in the prolog #102165
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update ARM64 LLVM AOT runtime builds to use the generic libclang.so file #102175
    area-Infrastructure, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove received bytes length check #100619
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Unify `GT_JMP` handling in the backends #102117
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix NRE in bulk memmove on x86 #102171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix name mangling for CoreLib #102183
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Enable RuntimeType.GenericCache to hold multiple types of cache entries #102034
    area-System.Runtime, runtime-coreclr
  • Provide MSBuild properties to use the new libc++ configuration we plan on using in our builds #101773
    blocked, area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • TypeDescriptor-related trimming supportType descriptor #102094
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use ``BitOperations`` in couple more places #101701
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Tiny improvement of `StringBuilder.Append(StringBuilder)` #101020
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add dynamic allocation sampling following a Poisson process instead of using a static threshold #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fold identical method bodies in the compiler #101969
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reapply keyword `params` #101499
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • SVE: Added `LoadVectorx2`, `LoadVectorx3`, `LoadVectorx4` APIs #102180
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Optimize memory allocations (#98702) #99542
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Fix TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride validation error #101246
    area-System.Reflection
  • Rework ProbabilisticMap character checks in SearchValues #101001
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Tensor wave 1 API's. #101196
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Create new X509CertificateLoader #102167
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Add OverloadResolutionPriorityAttribute #102176
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] Separate hybrid globalization JS code to es6 module #101543
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • Fix ulong->double conversion on x64 (without avx512f) #102179
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [wasm] Suppress export name minification #102155
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [workloads] Bump downlevel runtime produced package versions in the workload manifest #101806
    area-Workloads
  • Remove reflection from FrameworkDescription #102164
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][swift-interop] Support for Swift frozen struct lowering in mini-JIT/AOT/interpreter #102143
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Add more complete linux build instructions #101631
    area-Infrastructure
  • [RISC-V] Fix context restoration as #101709 describes #101865
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [Experiment] Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] Backport #92375 #102172
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Removed unused sessions from SSL_CTX internal cache #102095
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • basic support for TCP fast open #99490
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Interpret static constructors without a runtime invoke wrapper #101324
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Remove `linux-arm` as a supported RID in .NET8 #102072
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Fix invalid operand register in the emitted addition/subtraction code #102074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Reorder stores to make them amenable to stp optimization #102133
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Support for HTTP/3 multiple connections #101531
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V] Add quirks for riscv to R2RDump #101683
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • JSMarshalAs JSType Adjust comments and type parameters #101981
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution, needs-author-action, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Add ProbeLoongArch64Quirks() for R2RDump tool. #102146
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Adjust repro file message for merged test #102141
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make SocketsHttpHandler the default primary handler from HttpClientFactory #101808
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #102096
    area-System.IO.Compression, 6.0.x
